lenders.name: Bik
lenders.occupation: Co-founding Director, The Art House Southampton CIC

lenders.occupational_info: I am a Director of The Art House - a not-for-profit community art centre and vegetarian cafe in Southampton, UK

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: KIVA ROCKS!!!!

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: We all deserve a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a pediatrician providing general health care to children.

lenders.name: john
lenders.occupation: promoter (WOW magic sing at ayala center cebu phil
lenders.loan_because: i loan because i wish to have a small carenderia or small eatery for my wife.because she had a talent of cooking.she knows how to cook.she a graduate of Associate in Hotel and Restaurant Management.she can't find a job because of her height 4'11" feet.so right now she is taking care of our two children while i am working in a appliance company.my younger daughter is now 1 yr & my older son is 4yrs old which is supposedly in school right now,but my salary i not enough.because i am only earning 250 Philippine money or 5 dollars a day.so for her to have a extra income is to have our own small business.and that'smy gift for effort of taking care of us.
lenders.occupational_info: my work is only to have a meal 3 times a day or less.& its not enough.compare to those businessman.I can;t find a better job because i am undergraduate in Collage.

lenders.name: Stacy
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happy!

lenders.name: Courtney
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I help high school students prepare for college entrance exams.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I build web-based databases for non-profits dealing with at-risk youth.

lenders.name: Olathe Elementary
lenders.loan_because: Although, our community and students are poor by American standards, it is still important for our young students to learn to help others whenever they can.  They are learning  that it is not hard for anyone to make a difference in the world.

lenders.name: rene
lenders.whereabouts: cagayan de oro city misamis oriental

lenders.name: Dennis
lenders.loan_because: I'm grateful for what God has given me. I consider it a privilage to assist others in creating a better life for themselves and their loved ones.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist my clients in establishing their goals, and setting a course of  action to achieve them.

lenders.name: Shary
lenders.loan_because: My kids gave a present of an initial loan amount, knowing that I like to help others.  Kiva is a wonderful concept, helping others that have identified ways to support themselves within their culture and specific situation.  I look forward to making other loans as well!

lenders.name: Wilson
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy lending a helping hand and seeing other individuals succeed.

lenders.name: Cat Tales
lenders.loan_because: What a fantastic thing it is to be able to help someone establish their own small business as I've done for myself. Cheer happily out loud when each loan is fulfilled.  Love to see everyone pitching in to create such fantastic opportunites and self-sufficiency.

lenders.name: Tom Taylor
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people
lenders.occupational_info: Engineering Research

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I can. And because as a working woman, I want to connect with and support other working women around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I make and design my own jewelry and other crafts in my own time and spend my work week as a university librarian.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: We all need a little help to get started, some of us with family, some with money, but all with support.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the radio broadcasting industry.  We  are a small company that owns 15 radio stations around the USA.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I believe we can actually make the world a better place!

lenders.name: Analisa
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should be given a fair opportunity to reach their dreams
lenders.occupational_info: I work in publishing, creating entertaining and educational books

lenders.name: Matchbox Movement
lenders.loan_because: Matchbox Movement believes in giving an opportunity to those whose circumstances may not otherwise provide one. Our fortune should not be the burden of another but rather, recognized as a tool that can create enormous change.
lenders.occupational_info: Non-profit operating with the purpose of servicing those with immediate cash needs.

lenders.name: Estefanía & Federico
lenders.loan_because: Kiva makes it hard not to.. its wonderful!

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I think that everyone has something to offer. We can succeed together.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the communications director for a non profit foundation and also do freelance reporting using my home studio.

lenders.name: Stacie
lenders.occupational_info: Reproductive health and women's rights

lenders.name: Bonnie
lenders.loan_because: Tikkun Olam.  To heal the world.

lenders.name: Clayton
lenders.loan_because: every little thing counts.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a social studies teacher (history/geography)

lenders.name: Izabela
lenders.loan_because: Those who give much receive much.

lenders.name: Frank & Jen
lenders.loan_because: This is a very impactful way of empowering people around the world to help themselves in a very meaningful way by investing in themselves.

lenders.name: gretchen & dave
lenders.loan_because: I want to be connected to the world.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to provide for my family and still have a little left over to share with others who are in need. I respect their efforts and know that it is something Jesus would do.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: I think that in order for the world's economy to improve, we need to be willing to take risks and help those who are benifitial to society.

lenders.name: Ben Patrick
lenders.loan_because: My heart tells me to do so. I have a (very!) small foundation to help me with the tax aspects of giving, and look forward to using Kiva as well.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an announcer who sells TV shows and movies on American and global TV using my voice. I write novels, and have three published. I'm a gay and lesbian rights activist, writing blogs and creating webcasts, also serving on the board of Equality California, fighting for the rights of all Californians.

lenders.name: Jeanne
lenders.occupation: former GIS Analyst - now - at home mom

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: We have nothing else to depend on but each other.  I'm just doing my small part.

lenders.name: Alicia
lenders.loan_because: how could I not? The least I can do is help someone maintain their business when usually what they're asking for is less than my monthly rent. I sponsor children in Peru and Ecuador so I guess I mainly stick with those areas for that reason.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that helps facilitate the financial security of the US military and their families. I also am a part time college student trying to better myself so I can help others.

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: I can.  It's something I've been doing with my son for several years.
lenders.occupational_info: I get to work in a big building surrounded by books, technology, and lots of youthful energy.

lenders.name: Sonofvit
lenders.loan_because: Of the high rate of return I get.  Wait what?  I don't get interest???  Someone remind me to read the fine print next time...
lenders.occupational_info: I work in environmental consulting.  I love the outdoors and am fortunate to spend at least some of my time working outside.  I also believe strongly that poverty reduction is a necessary link to environmental protection.

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: It's too simple to not do it.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm studying accounting and world food issues.

lenders.name: Marty
lenders.loan_because: hard working people deserve opportunities to improve their situation.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach reading to special children who have difficulty learning.

lenders.name: Tricia
lenders.loan_because: I have been given so much and it's time to give a chance to others less fortunate who are willing to work hard to achieve.

lenders.name: Bonita
lenders.occupation: Supply Chain Transaction Help Desk Analyst 2

lenders.name: StacyB
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are working hard to improve their lives.  I prefer microlending to making donations because I can see how the funds are bring used and can loan again when the funds are repaid.

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: It provides me an opportunity to assist someone I otherwise probably couldn't.

lenders.name: Dorothy
lenders.loan_because: I admire people who are working to make a better life for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a geography teacher.  Hopefully, I give my students an appreciation of the world around us.

lenders.name: Teresa
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping those who want to make a difference in their lives and the lives of those around them.

lenders.name: Kerry
lenders.loan_because: Having lived in many of the countries your applicants come from, I am fully aware of their needs but also their determination and honesty.
lenders.occupational_info: As a retired teacher, I now spend much time sewing, quilting and working with fabric. I loved the local fabric crafts of Africa and India where I spent many years and support these efforts wholeheartedly.

lenders.name: Caci
lenders.loan_because: I want to help and the stories are great. I can't wait to see how these people progress and thrive!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an account manager for a large packaging firm in the US - my customer is a major retailer, with 167 stores across America.

lenders.name: Kevin Flahaut
lenders.loan_because: I've been very blessed and feel like it's my obligation, even in some small way to help others who are trying to better their lives.

lenders.name: Angel
lenders.loan_because: I am my sister's keeper.

lenders.name: Drew
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a chance at the opportunities I take for granted.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an environmental organization that works to save the planet. It is called Greenpeace.

lenders.name: Vicki
lenders.loan_because: I have lived all over the world (including Uganda where I left my heart) and think that microfinance is the most amazing and direct way to impact the lives of individuals who want to better themselves and their communities.

lenders.name: Beverly
lenders.loan_because: There is a disparity that I can remedy in some small way.  With Kiva, my small loans go a long way. I want my daughter and son to appreciate their privilege and share what we have.
lenders.occupational_info: I help dying people and their families in the final weeks and days of life.

lenders.name: innocent
lenders.loan_because: i am presently recording an album with some street children in my country sierra leone, i am a well recorgnise musician, i strongly believe that we will make a lot of money after we finish the album.
lenders.occupational_info: 80 percent of the  money i make each year  goes to the street children, because i my self was raised in the street, so my work presently is to raise money with my talent and the talents i found in the street children

lenders.name: Fortunate Moms
lenders.loan_because: It is important to all of us that we share our good fortunes as well as set an example for our children to do what we can to help improve the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: We have many different jobs but our most important role is that of mother.

lenders.name: Jacqueline
lenders.loan_because: My husband and I would not be moving forward in life if not for the help and generosity others have bestowed upon us. It's time to give back to the people who need it most.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people train their dogs to be well behaved.

lenders.name: Alice
lenders.loan_because: I want to enable people to live their life to the fullest.
lenders.occupational_info: Very chaotic at times.  The phones never stops ringing. The bulk of my day is spent editing and proofing legal documents.   One must know legal terminology as well as real estate terms.

lenders.name: Bonnie Irene
lenders.loan_because: My background is in microfinance and this is a way for me to stay involved at a program-like level!
lenders.occupational_info: I help nonprofits strengthen their programs so that more and better services get to those that need them.

lenders.name: Amber
lenders.loan_because: This is a wonderful way to help people help themselves. I don't agree with "handouts," but I very much agree with lending people a hand.
lenders.occupational_info: A portion of my first paycheck went to my second loan here. I hope to continue to lend for as long as this site exists :)

lenders.name: charles
lenders.occupational_info: Technology

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: Such a small gift for me can have such a huge impact on someone half way around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a professional singer, and I teach other professional singers.

lenders.name: Lynne
lenders.loan_because:
Oak Brook, Il.
United States

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: it's time for people to finance people.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: It takes a lot of courage to release the familiar and seemingly secure, to embrace the new. But there is no real security in what is no longer meaningful. There is more security in the adventurous and exciting, for in movement there is life, and in change there is power.

lenders.name: Bryan
lenders.loan_because: I like to see people who find it difficult to get money pick themselves up and run their own lives
lenders.occupational_info: Oil Industry

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lenders.name: Jeannette
lenders.loan_because:
es gibt nichts Gutes, ausser man tut es......
People who want to start a business in order to get a better live shoud'nt get stucked because of a lack of money

lenders.name: Dave and Polly
lenders.loan_because: God has been good to us and I think He likes it when we  share our blessings.
lenders.occupational_info: Computer Scientist

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others in the world who are not as fortunate as I am here in the United States and play a small role in assisting others to be self sufficient and enjoy the pleasures of life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a television cameraman in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, USA. I work for a Public Broadcasting television/radio station and shoot video for documentaries, as well as various other jobs related to TV production.

lenders.name: Rachael
lenders.loan_because: I am addicted to what I see in potential.

lenders.loan_because: i loan because
lenders.occupational_info: I 'm SE

lenders.occupational_info: ICT, mobile world, linux and other things

lenders.name: Karim
lenders.loan_because: I like to give, especially to those who appreciate what they will receive, and make good use of ot.
lenders.occupational_info: At my job I design websites

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I believe we have a duty to help one another as much we can within our means.  I believe this duty extends beyond race, nationality and gender and I am happy to be participating in helping to progress the future of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Religious Studies student.  At the moment I study through a distance learning course at the Open University (they are quite well known in the U.K.) and in the future I hope to have the chance to complete a post-graduate degree in a field associated with Eastern religion.

lenders.name: Garner
lenders.loan_because: I want to share the gifts I've been given in this world.
lenders.occupational_info: I fly people around in airplanes

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I believe a small helping hand can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the implementation of systems, applications, and services for large corporations.

lenders.name: Katie M.
lenders.loan_because: it really can change lives.

lenders.name: Justin & Casee
lenders.occupational_info: We are both currently students at The University of Tennessee. Casee is a English major and Justin is a Finance major.

lenders.name: Zak
lenders.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: You just have to love the human side of capitalism
lenders.occupational_info: I design wind turbines

lenders.name: Tami  Reed
lenders.loan_because: While traveling in Cambodia, I had the chance to help a family have a well dug for their home; they only had access to rice paddy water.  The well was dug in just a few days and I got to see the family use it before returning home. It was so gratifying to see how a little money made a big difference to the lives of this farming family.  Kiva lets me continue to make a small difference in the lives of other families who need a helping hand.

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.loan_because: helping others isn't an option for me.

lenders.name: Dirk
lenders.loan_because: It`s fascinating to get in touch with other people in other parts of the world. And they are Your business partners more or less, they are no beggars ! I hope this makes them feel proud.
lenders.occupational_info: Organizing railway operation and especially railway construction work für Deutsche Bahn (German Railway Company).

lenders.name: Race & Brianne
lenders.loan_because: We want to spread our Aloha onto others.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.occupational_info: I live in New Haven, Connecticut where I work in the Yale University Library as the librarian for U.S. history and American Studies (which means that I purchase history-related materials for the library).  A U.S. citizen by birth, my background is (Malaysian) Chinese and Irish.  Through my travels and reading I have developed a special affection for Mexico and Mexican culture.

lenders.name: Todd
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to be able to.

lenders.name: Kumud
lenders.loan_because: it can make a difference to someone's life.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I believe microfinance is the most brilliant innovation in charity since charity. That someone can dedicate as little as $25 of their wealth to allow it to help endless amounts of people is truly revolutionary.
lenders.occupational_info: I study political science at Temple University in Philadelphia and write for various publications at my school and in the city. And every country has school and writing, so little explanation is needed.

lenders.name: Russell
lenders.loan_because: I applaud the entrepreneurial spirit, and delight in helping others help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info:
I teach classes and write books to help adults learn and become more productive with engineering software.  I also assist non-profit groups and indigenous people in learning to use GPS, mapping and surveying technology to better manage their spatial data and land use.

I am a geographer - I love international travel, meeting terrific people and documenting my journeys through art, photography and writing.

The fellow at left is not me, 'tis Samuel Clemens (aka Mark Twain -  one of my favorite authors), observing a dramatic demonstration in the laboratory of Nikola Tesla, an entrepreneur whose ideas utterly eclipsed those of Edison, Bell and Ford combined.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: Because I believe individuals should help individuals. This site helps people who want learn "to fish".
lenders.occupational_info: I go to university and I work in a Museum.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: This organization makes it so easy to help others!
lenders.occupational_info: Professor

lenders.name: Alexandra
lenders.loan_because: I should.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: i want to help make a difference in people lives

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: When I realize how fortunate I am and how little it takes to really help someone change their life it's hard not to loan through Kiva.  By helping one person improve their life we can impact many people around them, not just family, but others in the community as well. I prefer loaning to women since they traditionally have the hardest time getting regular loans.

lenders.name: Joe & Simone
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are survivors, not lucky enought to have been born in a land of abundance.  I'm also trying to teach my daughter what it means to help and how to improve this bizarre planet.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for lawyers who represent people in legal disputes or who the government has accused of committing a crime.  Simone is 5 years old and likes to grow vegetables and herbs.

lenders.name: Nate
lenders.occupational_info: Student in my first year of medical school.  My wife Amelia is a high school English teacher.

lenders.name: Julene
lenders.loan_because: I love to travel and want to improve the world we live in.
lenders.occupational_info: Working with people in an organization to improve their skills in leadership, project management and teamwork. Improving the business with the coordination of people.

lenders.name: The B-C Family
lenders.loan_because: We have been blessed throughout our lives and want to extent those same blessings on to other families around the world.

lenders.name: LUIS
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed and it's time to help.
lenders.occupational_info: Sell real estate in Los Angeles

lenders.name: leslie, allen, & boys
lenders.loan_because: I believe in changing the world one person/family at a time. I want to raise my sons do the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I spend my days taking care of my three little boys. At night I paint and sell my work on the internet. My husband is an engineer, he builds things.

lenders.name: Merle
lenders.loan_because: As a retired banker I know credit can change individual lives, families and communities.

lenders.name: HUM 455 -  Spring 2008
lenders.loan_because: We want to put what we are learning in class into practice in the real world.

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: I can afford to, the first two loans were a gift to my mom for mother's day
lenders.occupational_info: University student studying land use planning in Wisconsin

lenders.name: Jeffrey
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people all around the world to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach college students history and current events and issues, and, as director of an Honors Program/College, I help motivated students to be the best that they can be and accomplish as much as they can.

lenders.name: Courtney
lenders.loan_because: It should be our responsibility to help eachother reguardless of ethnicity, gender or geography.  I want to help others especially who are pro-active in helping themselves, their families and communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a Pathology lab at a University hospital  were I dissect surgical specimens, preform post mortem exams and help train medical students.

lenders.name: Rachael
lenders.loan_because: I LEND because friends lent money to me years ago and it made all the difference in my life.  I am lucky,  I work hard, and I never forget the importance of the circle of giving and receiving.
lenders.occupational_info: I own and run three guesthouses, little hotels in the city.  I have about 30 people working for me.  Most of them, and many of my guests come from foreign lands.  While my work does not allow me to travel, it gives me the privilege of meeting and getting to know people from everywhere.

lenders.name: Dana & Kimberlea
lenders.loan_because: We are called of God to spend ourselves on behalf of others, to loose the chains of injustice.
lenders.occupational_info: We provide a haven of safety for abandoned and neglected children.

lenders.name: Toni
lenders.loan_because: by many standards I may not have much, but I am blessed with what I do have.  If we aren't here to help others, what are we here for?
lenders.occupational_info: I coordinate a courthouse facility that handles criminal cases for kids under the age of 18 years.

lenders.name: Stephen and Erika
lenders.loan_because: We own two businesses and sometimes folks need to reach out to help your business grow.  Our family has been fortunate to have a terrific customer base, We want to see other folks in our world succeed in their own business venture by sharing the fruit of our success.
lenders.occupational_info: We own a summer day camp for children - in the summer months when school is not in session they come to our property and play, swim, boat.  During the school year we operate our construction and home repair business.

lenders.name: Paula
lenders.loan_because: The world has loaned so much to me for the brief time I am here on the planet......
lenders.occupational_info: I have the opportunity to listen to people as they share personal life stories, including the good and the diifficult details,The sharing with another neutral person, seems to assist in working through life's many traumas.  It is incredible to be a small part so many lives.

lenders.name: Jay
lenders.loan_because: I have so much.  They have so little.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.  I like donating money but I think lending money will help me spend  my money wiser.  I am not a rich person, but I have money to share, and if I loan the money and get it back, that can maximise the amount of money I have to share.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with multiply disabled children and I love having the opportunity to smile and laugh with them everyday! :)

lenders.name: CATHERINE
lenders.loan_because: Hola, mi edad es de 24 tengo una nena de 3 .Necesito trabajar para poder salir adelante.Doy el servicio de manicura, pedicura y unas de acrilico pero no he podido habilitar un salon para dar todo el servicio de bellea como cortes , tintes etc.Ya q mi situacion economica no me lo ha permitido.He visitado varios lugares para ver un prestamo y asi empezar a trabajar pero en ningun lado me lo dan porque no puedo comprobar ingresos.Ojala aqui si se pueda.Esto seria un gran empujon para que salga adelante y para devolverlo, muchas gracias.
lenders.occupational_info: Como algo noble, que hace q la mujer se sienta mas bella de lo q es.Al igual q los hombres.

lenders.name: John Rynne
lenders.loan_because: I believe that a lot of small contributions can make a huge difference in ordinary people's lives, helping small businesses get off the ground.
lenders.occupational_info: I translate written texts (mainly financial documents) from Spanish into English.

lenders.name: Lynne
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back some of the good that has come my way.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a continuing care centre as a Food Service Aide.

lenders.name: Charlie
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good helping entrepreneurs rise to their potential.  Capital is a tool every bit as necessary to an entrepreneur as a hammer is to a carpenter.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a company where I help make mobile devices.  Regardless of the brand, I believe mobile devices have the capability of empowering people economically and politically, and I want to help enable the virtuous cycle by donating!

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: I Can
lenders.occupational_info: I fly airplanes

lenders.name: killu
lenders.loan_because: We have benefited from being given chances, and would like to give back - what is a small, ordinary contirbution to us may turn into something extraordinary for others, just as has happened to us in years past. We would also like to teach our children to become conscientious citizens of the world, to help people help themselves, and to nurture entrepreneurial spirit by watching real life successes and failures. Kiva is good for the soul of the giver and the receiver.
lenders.occupational_info: We work in the field of biotechnology aimed at developing new medical breakthroughs in treatment and prevention of disease.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: Every one should have the opportunity to be in control of their own destiny.  I believe this is definately one way to take control.

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because: It makes the money I set aside to help others go further.

lenders.name: Owen
lenders.loan_because: Hoy por ti, mañana por mi.

lenders.name: Darla
lenders.loan_because: I can connect with the world in my own small way and help others who want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in software sales.

lenders.name: Lolo
lenders.loan_because: I am deeply impressed and affected by the ingenuity of this effort and of the people it touches.
lenders.occupational_info: Since 1983, I haved worked as a registered nurse, caring for tiny or sick babies from all over Alaska. I love what I do and am so fortunate to work with an amazing group of people. I am also a proud member of "Kiva Nurses", an awesome lending group with caring people from throughout the world.

lenders.name: ange
lenders.loan_because: we're all in this together :-)

lenders.name: Ray
lenders.loan_because: I believe making the world a better place can happen one small step at a time.

lenders.name: DENNY
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: I wanted to support it because I wanted to support my friend Brooke, and also because I think the idea itself is very good, and I am in a position to benefit these people so wanted to do my bit, although I'm not limiting myself just to this.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: As a struggling small business owner I know how difficult it is to get started.  This is an amazing opportunity to pay it forward!
lenders.occupational_info: I specialize in detailed travel planning to off the beaten track destinations.  My goal is to create truly unique experiences and trips of a lifetime.  I firmly believe that travel not only opens the mind of the traveler, but it also helps support a local community.  A winning combination!

lenders.name: Gwendolyn
lenders.loan_because: I have a small retail mobile reloading business and I want to expand it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mother of 5 kids and my husband is working as a customer service representative.  I am selling/retailing mobile loads to help my husband to support our big family and for an additional income for our daily sustainance . 4 of kids are in school and my husband's income is enough to support my children's education and daily needs.  I want to have a stall for my business so I can easily be reach by my customers since I am only based at home

lenders.name: The Stong Family
lenders.loan_because: We like helping fellow entrepreneurs and know how valuable a helping hand can be.  Especially in the early going.
lenders.occupational_info: We sell gifts on the internet.

lenders.name: Jenny
lenders.loan_because: give other people a chance at a better life
lenders.occupational_info: work in finance for the Education Dept.

lenders.name: ritchell
lenders.loan_because: i want to have a small business to finance our daily needs.and if will be successful on it i wanted to enroll my younger sisiter in college because she havent been in school for 2 years.the moment she finished her highschool.
lenders.occupational_info: actually iwas working as a contractual,after 6 months my contract has ended ,and for now im still looking for job,thats why while i still look for another one,i wanted to try a small business.

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: I recently visited Kenya and found a desperate need for aid in the medical field.

lenders.name: Robert & Brigitt
lenders.loan_because: We believe in small family and group enterprises as key players in economic and social development. Our personal sympathy is for Southeast Asia.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I think it is the best way to help individuals and communities while allowing people to maintain their independence. Its contractual, accountable and effective.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in sales and marketing

lenders.name: andrei
lenders.loan_because: When we make a better world for these few ones we make a better world for everybody else including ourselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Bathing myself in capitalism

lenders.name: Hannah
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I do development work for social ventures and charities

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of one.  One can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I work 7 days a week in my own business, a small motel in a rural area.  My guests make the hard work worthwhile. .

lenders.name: Frédéric Sennhauser
lenders.loan_because:
"When it's a question of money, everybody is of the same religion"
-Voltaire
lenders.occupational_info: Responsible for SHARK Energy Drink in Spain, Portugal, Andorra and Gibraltar.

lenders.name: Kerr Cuhulain
lenders.loan_because: Founder of the Order of Scathach, a Wiccan order of Knighthood.  We want to help people in other parts of the world to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Kerr is a retired police officer now working as a police dispatcher.  Other members of our Scathach group are army officers, private investigators, musicians, and office managers.

lenders.name: Dorota
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help poor people in the world to became self-independent.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an architect and volunteer

lenders.name: Janis
lenders.loan_because: small changes can make a big difference

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I too at one point in my life was a single mother trying to raise 2 children and could have used help then today i want to give back to other women in this same place.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a painter and creative multi media artist

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because: It works!
lenders.occupational_info:
Since 1973 I've made my living designing, crafting and selling metal sculpture for homes and offices.

Putting this experience to work I now produce instructional videos for people who want to do what I do.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed to have and be able to give to those who do not have, a chance of earning a living, respectably, without taking charity.

lenders.name: Martha
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate to have most of what I need and I know there are others that just need a chance to make their lives better
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a nurse in surgery

lenders.name: Stacey
lenders.loan_because: I've been given opportunities in life and I want to help others who haven't been as fortunate but are trying to make things better.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: My lovely daughter started me with a Mother's Day gift certificate. She's been donating for a while and has seen great results.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a graphic design/marketing business. I work from my home office so I'm also home for my two younger sons and my dog. It's been very empowering to have my own business and I love the idea of helping others start their business.

lenders.name: Laurel
lenders.loan_because: I respect people who try to succeed. I like to help them do so in countries where survival, never mind success, is so difficult.
lenders.occupational_info: I write books. I am a storyteller.

lenders.name: Deana
lenders.loan_because: My goal in life is to help as many people as I can, whenever I can.  As a college student that can be hard at times, but I always do what I can.

lenders.name: salvador
lenders.loan_because: i know i'm making a diffrence in these people life's.

lenders.name: cory
lenders.loan_because: We are a global community and should help each other develop ideas and achieve dreams
lenders.occupational_info: I study the earth.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I have lived in Togo and visited southern Ghana -- I have a great deal of respect for the hard working people of this area.
lenders.occupational_info: As a professor of English rhetoric in California high schools and colleges, I tried to inspire students to learn about the rest of the world, and to appreciate their many blessings.  It's important not to take education for granted, and to work hard to develop literacy in as many languages as possible.

lenders.name: Leila
lenders.loan_because: I've been lucky enough to have been able to start my own business and I'd like to help others have the same opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info:
I'm a photographer, specializing in modern boudoir.  

Other than that, I'm a mother and a wife.  I'm very active in our Unitarian church.  My family and I just brought our 5 year old son home from Ethiopia and, let me tell you, nothing's been the same since!!!

My dream is to win the lottery so that I could give almost all of the money away to charities.  =)

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: My compassionate son gave me a Kiva certificate Mother's Day gift, to help make the world a better place.

lenders.name: Janice
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great program, I'm glad to be able to help.

lenders.name: linda karana
lenders.loan_because: i feel very fortunate to have the funds to share with others who are working to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: i am a healer and a writer, living each day to "be the change".

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because: I like giving and helping people with their businesses.  I get a kiva gift card for Christmas every year.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm 12years old and my work is school.

lenders.name: Catie
lenders.loan_because: I'm helping others
lenders.occupational_info: I learn

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed buy God and he has called to be a blessing.

lenders.name: mihkel
lenders.loan_because: If everyone contributes a little, it can turn into something really big, and that is one way to change the world for the better
lenders.occupational_info: My job is to make sure the accounting and financing of my company is working the way it should

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: It brings me joy to join with others and offer someone in need a step up to improve theirs and their family's life.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: It helps the world, and i thought it was a brilliant idea.

lenders.name: terri
lenders.loan_because: gift from my oldest son

lenders.name: Justin
lenders.loan_because: Traditional means of human advancement have proven to be a failure for the most part.  The idea of loaning money in this way seems promising.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student online.  I'm studying to become a computer technician.

lenders.name: Roberta Rosenberg
lenders.loan_because: for every gift I get, it's important to give one back.
lenders.occupational_info: I help to make other business owners successful.

lenders.name: Cassie
lenders.loan_because: I believe this sort of empowerment not only creates leaders, but it also creates lasting change
lenders.occupational_info: I am a substitute teacher and work at an airline--but my real work right now is planning to volunteer back in West Africa

lenders.name: Carol From Tucson, AZ
lenders.loan_because: I want to share my good fortune with those less fortunate. God has blessed me and I should share those blessings with others.
lenders.occupational_info: Volunteer for African refugees in America.

lenders.name: Kelsey
lenders.loan_because: We have to look out for each other.
lenders.occupational_info: Learning every day, and seeing the sights along the way.

lenders.name: Jay
lenders.loan_because: I think it is great to be able to help others across the world improve their and their family's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a PhD student in political science at Washington University in St. Louis, Missouri.

lenders.name: Vince
lenders.loan_because: I see Kiva as a great opportunity to help many individuals around the world help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a travel company that provides tours for Senior (older than age 50) Americans to go overseas and truly experience local cultures.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: What's not to like??  This is a wonderful program and a great opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach and study Spanish, help friends, work at the Humane Society, the St. Vincent de Paul Society, care for my family and home, do yoga, travel, enjoy a priviledged retirement.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping others.  We all need a hand sometime.

lenders.name: Agnieszka
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people who deserve to be helped. Our my family was helped many years ago by virtual strangers and this is the way I repay our debt since now we can do it.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people helping them to manage money so that is lasts for them for a long time.

lenders.name: Darryl & Sue
lenders.loan_because:
Our Grandson was born in September 2010, and our Granddaughter in April 2013.  We hope this, in a small way makes the world a better place for our grandchildren to grow up in. When 
they are old enough to understand, we'll explain to them the value of assisting those in the world who don't have the opportunities that  life has given us in Canada.

lenders.name: Sarita
lenders.loan_because: I am able to choose who I help and the borrower is  able to choose the help they seek. Kiva offers a link between us that makes sense to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I trade international currency and stock.

lenders.name: Reetash and Cinda
lenders.loan_because:
Its good to spread the love and abundance. To all you lenders out there and the Kiva staff "You Rock".
It helps build belief. It's a gift that keeps on giving.
lenders.occupational_info: Self employed lifestyle entrepreneurs and loving it.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.occupational_info: I do tuberculosis and HIV care

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I

lenders.name: Ivy
lenders.loan_because: it makes sense to help people become self-sufficient and self-sustaining. People who are blessed are responsible to help the social good.
lenders.occupational_info: helping children and families who have experienced a hardship heal.

lenders.name: Kashif
lenders.loan_because: trying to do my small part to give back.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: this is the greatest opportunity to lend with warm hands to someone who really really needs help, and take a step up and out
lenders.occupational_info: medical professional doing Q&A full time for a national company, Artist in all mediums is my joy and release, entrepreneur and marketer for my art and health products

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: as my toddler says "sharing is caring".  A simple sentiment, but at all levels, he is right.

lenders.name: Friesen-Beardsell clan
lenders.loan_because: it makes a difference in the world.

lenders.name: TDL
lenders.loan_because: It would have been a really tough road for me without the help I received, so I know a little help goes a long way...

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I am a world traveler -- every chance I get! -- and am thrilled to find ways to really make a difference and help individual people directly.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the NYC public schools with SpEd teenagers, helping them develop job skills and teaching them about the real world. My class has continuously helped choose Kiva loans!

lenders.name: unnamed
lenders.loan_because: a poor carpenter keeps on lending me.

lenders.name: Masakatsu
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone should have an opportunity to succeed and I would like to help people make a difference in their life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently working as an engineer who develops a key electronic device called image sensor used in product such as digital still cameras and video cameras.

lenders.name: Maree
lenders.loan_because: it is a fantastic opportunity to assist someone to get ahead and have a better life for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people with a disability and help give them good services and have the very best life they can.

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: I believe that entrepreneurship and innovation can bring the wealth of the human race up across the board. Together, we can eliminate poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a partner in a company that provides services to individuals and other small companies that own and operate business aircraft. We buy and sell aircraft, provide pilot training, and perform technical inspections on aircraft.

lenders.name: Sayce
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: i was given $20 and instructed to change the world, so i added 5 of my own, and that's what i intend to do.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: I have more than I need.  It is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a small manufacturing firm.  We employ 15 people

lenders.name: Kathryn
lenders.loan_because: I wanted to participate in creating a little happiness, and I believe in the golden rule.
lenders.occupational_info: I purchase items that my company requires to do business. I hope my loans enable others to do the same!

lenders.name: Claartje
lenders.loan_because: Its really good when you can help other people making there dreams come true. The nicest thing in live is when you are in the position you can help other people.
lenders.occupational_info: I am social worker at primary schools in Amsterdam.

lenders.name: globalista
lenders.loan_because: Communicate, educate, reduce, reuse, recycle!

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I've been given a fantastic opportunity, it's the right thing to do and... it makes me feel good!
lenders.occupational_info: Enjoyable

lenders.name: Nyanya Aisha
lenders.loan_because:
I believe in "Wreckless Generousity"... I've seen it's gifts manifest in my life... & I simply must find meaningful ways to impact the lives of my brothas & sistahs around the world! 

AMANDLA!!!

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I want to offer chances so honest, ambitious and hard working people can grow and succeed in the same way that so many have helped offer me opportunities over the years.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide information about products so sellers can find the right buyers for their products and buyers can spend their money wisely.

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because: People help me and I help others in return. The book "The Rudolph Factor".
lenders.occupational_info: Mentoring people that have a strong desire to grow their business and make better business decisions. Co-author of the book, The Rudolph Factor.

lenders.name: Gerrit
lenders.loan_because: it's fair, and more sustainable than donating

lenders.name: Mhe - Amor
lenders.loan_because: I want to help my mom put up a piggery
lenders.occupational_info: it is not sufficient to help my whole family that's why I want to make a loan for my mom to help us support our daily needs.

lenders.name: JohnW
lenders.loan_because: I want to help transform a war-torn and fractious Middle East with aid to entrepreneurs
lenders.occupational_info: Manage business finances

lenders.name: Jake
lenders.loan_because:
I believe in the teachings of Share International that the world will be uplifted through sharing.    
            Share-International.org
lenders.occupational_info: I work in hospitality and in Healing.  I do Shamballa Energy Healing and Meditation for the uplifting of all of mankind.

lenders.name: Nina & Gustav
lenders.loan_because: We asked to receive money to give away for charity as wedding gift instead of stupid things...

lenders.name: Brandy
lenders.loan_because: I would want someone to give me the same chance.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I loan therefore I am
lenders.occupational_info: I teach science and game design in a high school

lenders.name: kelly
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happy :)

lenders.name: Carolyn and Frank
lenders.loan_because: We encourage and support entrepreneurs around the world to create a better life for themselves and their family.
lenders.occupational_info: Professionals (retired)

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world.  I think that in a small way, I can put aside a certain amount of my income to help those that are less fortunate without calling it a handout.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I believe empowering women will make the world a better place

lenders.name: Dr. Kamba
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people who help themselves

lenders.name: Michael & Maria
lenders.loan_because: "if your brother becomes poor and cannot maintain himself, you shall maintain him.  You shall not lend him your money at interest, not give him your food for profit."  Leviticus 25:35

lenders.name: Carolyn and Craig
lenders.loan_because: I have been to Africa recently (Rwanda and Kenya) with some wonderful non-profits - Project Jambo, and Women for Women International...and I've seen the miracles small loans/help can give.
lenders.occupational_info: I direct a Division in County government that provides animal care services, vehicle licensing, marriage licensing, and document management services to the public.

lenders.name: Jenny
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I believe in the innate goodness of people and that individuals drive economies. Change happens little by little, then all of a sudden.
lenders.occupational_info: I train people how to use computers, work well with others and market products

lenders.name: Macey & Liam
lenders.loan_because:
I give because it feels good to give to people who need it. -MACEY

It makes me feel good when I loan.  I hope he gets profit so that he can get what his family needs.
lenders.occupational_info:
I go to school, do gymnastics, swimming, soccer, and piano and I play with my brother. -MACEY

I go to school, play chess, play with my friends, do art, and learn.

lenders.name: Laure
lenders.loan_because: I support micro-loans as a way to empower people.

lenders.name: Grant
lenders.loan_because: many need a leg up...If not us, who? If not now, when?

lenders.name: Tomas
lenders.loan_because: I like to help my countrymen
lenders.occupational_info: Supporting Entrepreneurs

lenders.name: July Ono
lenders.loan_because: my mission is to inspire and empower the world to live in hope and victory in order that we may create a global community based on collaboration, contribution and co-operation. Can you imagine it? I do every day. I believe that one day, together, we can do it.

lenders.name: Connie
lenders.loan_because: It fits in with my view of the way the world should work and how I should function in it.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the care of patients who are undergoing treatment for cancer on clinical trials.

lenders.name: Jan-Paul
lenders.loan_because: To me, helping people out in helping themselves is a much better option than making them dependent on aid or donations.
lenders.occupational_info: business analysis & marketing of specialty ingredients for the food industry.

lenders.name: Julie,Monkton On,Canada
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: grow corn, wheat and soybeans to help feed the world

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I truly believe it is one of the best ways to help people help theirselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a Swiss bank. I lead a team which is responsable for the prompt execution of our clients orders.

lenders.name: A. Vitalis Memorial Fund
lenders.loan_because: These loans are made in loving memory of our beloved mother, mother-in-law and grandmother, who passed away in September 2007.   Anne will be remembered for the kindness  and unconditional love she gave to our family.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: I like to put some my personal capital to work to help honest, serious people build their own small businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a small company in the USA. The purpose of our main research project is to develop new tests that can be used to predict which anti-cancer drug would work the best for a patient.

lenders.name: Caitlin
lenders.loan_because: I want to be charitable and I like that Kiva allows me to do so interactively. I like knowing that my money is helping someone specific, who has a purpose and goals they want to reach. I like knowing that my money isn't just being put in a bucket - it's being put into an active cycle. When it comes back to me I can feel like it did something good and then put it back in the cycle to do more good.
lenders.occupational_info: I study old buildings and learn about their history and construction. I help architects learn how best to restore buildings, and inform city planners and real estate developers what buildings should be preserved in order to create a better, beautiful, livable, sustainable built environment.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I currently work as a guest teacher--taking over classrooms when the regular teacher is sick or cannot for some reason come to school. I am working toward becoming a bilingual (Spanish) elementary school teacher.

lenders.name: Hao Ngo Brown Cow
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are willing to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an IT professional.  I have been doing enterprise IT work for 10 years.

lenders.name: Grace
lenders.loan_because: I am a micro-business owner and I know how difficult it can be to get a bank loan.

lenders.name: Joan
lenders.loan_because: I've been very fortunate and want to give others the opportunity to achieve their goals and dreams. Thanks to Kiva, I don't have to be a millionaire to make a difference in the world. I can see the people my loans are going to and share in their excitement of  succeeding. How cool to be able to help in such a direct way!!

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: I already have more than I need and there are people who don't.  Every little bit adds up to a lot

lenders.name: Marcelo Rios
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help build a new world. A world where everyone has the same opportunity to conquer your dream.

lenders.name: Chris and Aliina
lenders.loan_because: These Kiva loans were given as gifts for Chris and Aliina's wedding
